Related repos

  • Denoises speech and extends bandwidth
  • Power-user TTS pipeline for speech synthesis and voice conversion
  • OpenAI-style text-to-speech API with voice cloning and web UI
  • Chatterbox TTS ported to vLLM for faster, more efficient speech synthesis
  • text-to-speech library for generating voices with controllable style and speaker traits
  • Text-to-speech with natural language style control
  • Chatbox: open-source chat app for local AI or custom models
  • Text-to-dialogue model, clones voices
  • Ultravox: open-source model that handles both text and voice inputs for conversational AI
